sentences.sContent: The clay minerals in 65 surface sediment samples from the Changjiang River subaqueous delta were analyzed by using X ray diffraction (XRD) analysis technique.
sentences.sContent_eng: The clay minerals in 65 surface sediment samples from the Changjiang River subaqueous delta were analyzed by using X ray diffraction (XRD) analysis technique.
sentences.sCn: 采用X射线衍射（XRD）分析技术分析了长江水下三角洲地区65个表层沉积物样品的粘土矿物。

words.tran: 做替工；地下灌溉；[感光] 底层涂布

trans.tranOther: occurring, appearing, formed, or used under water
